column2: InvestmentRiskDashboard %>% group_by(class) %>% summarize(total = sum(current_value)) %>% mutate(total_text = scales::comma(total)) %>% ggplot(aes(x = class, y = total)) + geom_col() + geom_label(aes(label = total_text)) + theme_tq() + scale_fill_tq() + theme(axis.text.y = element_blank()) + labs(x = "Class", y = "Total", title = "SIAM INVESTMENTS LIMITED PORTFOLIO 2020")
